info.title: Azure Monitor Control Plane API
info.description: Provides operations for working with Azure Monitor

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists all workspaces in the specified subscription

Returns the specific Azure Monitor workspace

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AzureMonitorWorkspaceListResult.description: The response of a AzureMonitorWorkspace list operation.

value.description: The AzureMonitorWorkspace items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AzureMonitorWorkspaceLogsApiConfig.description: Azure Monitor Workspace Logs Api configurations.

stream.description: Stream name in destination. Azure Monitor stream is related to the destination table.

schema.description: The schema mapping for incoming data.

AzureMonitorWorkspaceLogsExporter.description: Azure Monitor Workspace Logs specific configurations.

api.description: API configurations for Azure Monitor workspace exporter.

AzureMonitorWorkspaceProperties.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a new workspace.

accountId.description: The immutable ID of the Azure Monitor workspace. This property is read-only.

metrics.description: Information about metrics for the Azure Monitor workspace

defaultIngestionSettings.description: The Data Collection Rule and Endpoint used for ingestion by default.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Gets or sets allow or disallow public network access to workspace

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Azure Monitor workspace. Set to Succeeded if everything is healthy.

AzureMonitorWorkspaceUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the AzureMonitorWorkspace.

AzureMonitorWorkspaceUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the AzureMonitorWorkspace.

metrics.description: Information about metrics for the Azure Monitor workspace

workerCount.description: Number of parallel workers processing the log queues.

batchQueueSize.description: Size of the queue for log batches.

azureMonitorWorkspaceLogs.description: Azure Monitor Workspace Logs specific configurations.

tcp.description: TCP based exporter. Used for pipelineGroup exporter.

values.name: AzureMonitorWorkspaceLogs
values.description: Export logs to Azure Monitor Workspace.

values.name: PipelineGroup
values.description: Export data to another pipeline group instance.

ExternalNetworkingMode.description: The mode of the external networking.

dataCollectionRuleResourceId.description: The Azure resource Id of the default data collection rule for this workspace.

dataCollectionEndpointResourceId.description: The Azure resource Id of the default data collection endpoint for this workspace.

Metrics.description: Information about metrics for the workspace

prometheusQueryEndpoint.description: The Prometheus query endpoint for the workspace

internalId.description: An internal identifier for the metrics container. Only to be used by the system

NetworkingConfiguration.description: Networking configuration for the pipeline group instance.

host.description: The address exposed on the cluster. Example: azuremonitorpipeline.contoso.com.

receiver.description: The name of the previously defined receiver.

port.description: The port that will be configured externally. If not specified, it will use the port from the receiver definition.

PersistenceConfigurations.description: Persistence options to all pipelines in the instance.

persistentVolumeName.description: The name of the mounted persistent volume.

PersistenceConfigurationsUpdate.description: Persistence options to all pipelines in the instance.

persistentVolumeName.description: The name of the mounted persistent volume.

receivers.description: Reference to receivers configured for the pipeline.

processors.description: Reference to processors configured for the pipeline.

exporters.description: Reference to exporters configured for the pipeline.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

extendedLocation.description: The extended location for given pipeline group.

PipelineGroupListResult.description: The response of a PipelineGroup list operation.

value.description: The PipelineGroup items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PipelineGroupProperties.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a new pipeline group instance.

replicas.description: Defines the amount of replicas of the pipeline group instance.

receivers.description: The receivers specified for a pipeline group instance.

processors.description: The processors specified for a pipeline group instance.

exporters.description: The exporters specified for a pipeline group instance.

service.description: The service section for a given pipeline group instance.

networkingConfigurations.description: Networking configurations for the pipeline group instance.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of a pipeline group instance. Set to Succeeded if everything is healthy.

PipelineGroupUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the PipelineGroup.

PipelineGroupUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the PipelineGroup.

replicas.description: Defines the amount of replicas of the pipeline group instance.

processors.description: The processors specified for a pipeline group instance.

exporters.description: The exporters specified for a pipeline group instance.

service.description: The service section for a given pipeline group instance.

networkingConfigurations.description: Networking configurations for the pipeline group instance.

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of a resource.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: State of the public network access.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: The public network access is enabled

values.name: Disabled
values.description: The public network access is disabled

syslog.description: Syslog configurations. This field is mandatory for syslog type receivers.

otlp.description: OTLP receiver configurations. This field is mandatory for OTLP and pipelineGroup receivers.

udp.description: UDP receiver configurations. This field is mandatory for UDP receivers.

values.name: Ama
values.description: Receives data from azure monitor agent receiver.

values.name: PipelineGroup
values.description: Receives data from another pipeline group.

values.name: OTLP
values.description: Receives data from a OTLP collector.

values.name: UDP
values.description: Receives data from an UDP collector.

RecordMap.description: Record map for schema in azure monitor.

ResourceMap.description: Resource map for schema in azure monitor.

SchemaMap.description: Schema map for azure monitor for logs.

resourceMap.description: Resource Map captures information about the entity for which telemetry is recorded. For example, metrics exposed by a Kubernetes container can be linked to a resource that specifies the cluster, namespace, pod, and container name.Resource may capture an entire hierarchy of entity identification. It may describe the host in the cloud and specific container or an application running in the process.

scopeMap.description: A scope map is a logical unit of the application code with which the emitted telemetry can be associated.

ScopeMap.description: Scope map for schema in azure monitor.

pipelines.description: Pipelines belonging to a given pipeline group.

persistence.description: Persistence options to all pipelines in the instance.

pipelines.description: Pipelines belonging to a given pipeline group.

persistence.description: Persistence options to all pipelines in the instance.

values.name: nop
values.description: No encoding validation. Treats the file as a stream of raw bytes.

values.name: utf_16le
values.description: UTF-16 encoding with little-endian byte order.

values.name: utf_16be
values.description: UTF-16 encoding with little-endian byte order.

SyslogProtocol.description: The syslog protocol to parse messages.

SyslogReceiver.description: Base receiver using TCP as transport protocol.

protocol.description: Protocol to parse syslog messages. Default rfc3164

TcpExporter.description: Base exporter using TCP as transport protocol.

TcpReceiver.description: Base receiver using TCP as transport protocol.

UdpReceiver.description: Receiver using UDP as transport protocol.

encoding.description: The encoding of the stream being received.

values.name: nop
values.description: No encoding validation. Treats the file as a stream of raw bytes.

values.name: utf_16le
values.description: UTF-16 encoding with little-endian byte order.

values.name: utf_16be
